name: Clamperl
description: The Bivalve Pokémon. Clamperl's sturdy shell is not only good for protection-it is also used for clamping and catching prey. A fully grown Clamperl's shell will be scored with nicks and scratches all over.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to extra damage dealt by a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a damaging Dark, Bug, or Ghost move, it makes its next attack at advantage.
